name: KhAI Algorithms
tagline: Sport Programming trainings at NAU KhAI!
body:
### Welcome to KhAI Algorithms!
Sport programming trainings powered by:
* the NAU KhAI
* the State University of New York at Stony Brook
* the Sealpoint Co.

### Where are lectures and materials?
All materials from lectures and meetings - separate folders in the repository, 
HW's description and references - separate Wiki pages.

### Questions about homework's?
Post them as as an issue in the issue tracking system, so everybody can comment.

### Authors and Contributors
Oleksii Starov and Dmytro Rusin.

### Support or Contact
Just email us at ostarov@cs.stonybrook.edu and d.rusin@sealpoint.co
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
